name: Plants From Hell
description:
This is a top down bullet hell type game made in 36 hours, programmed by Arsen_Net, you enter an arena where plants from hell start to come out through a portal, you as a little sprout have to prevent it, but... luck will be from your side?

Every now and then the dice will be rolled, which will make the enemies acquire Powers up and you will change your attack depending on what the dice say

TEAM:

Dev Lead and Artist: Arsen_Net
Co-Dev: Welvex
SFX: Raithorn
Musician: MetalKamina

Note: 
Unfortunately the engine that we was using to make the game crashed and doesn't work anymore, so the game stayed like this, in the future we plan to improve it
